com.quintrix.jepsen.erik

Class ReportWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quintrix.jepsen.erik.ReportWriter

  • public class ReportWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Writes the grade report to a file and moves the file into the current user's Documents folder.
    Author:
    Erik Jepsen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReportWriter()
      The class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CloseReport()
      If a file exists in backupLoc it is deleted.
      If a file exists in reportLoc it is moved to backupLoc.
      Finally, the temporary report file is moved to reportLoc.
      void CreateReport()
      Creates a temporary file for writing a grade report to.
      protected void finalize() 
      java.lang.String getOutputLoc()
      Get the location CloseReport moves the report to.
      void WriteLine(java.lang.String thisLine)
      Writes the passed line to the report.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReportWriter

        public ReportWriter()
        The class constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • CreateReport

        public void CreateReport()
        Creates a temporary file for writing a grade report to.

      • WriteLine

        public void WriteLine(java.lang.String thisLine)
               throws java.lang.RuntimeException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Writes the passed line to the report. Empty and null lines are ignored.
        Parameters:
        thisLine - The line to be written to the report.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Thrown if CreateReport has not been called or if the report has already been closed by CloseReport.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the report has not been started or cannot be written to.

      • CloseReport

        public void CloseReport()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        If a file exists in backupLoc it is deleted.
        If a file exists in reportLoc it is moved to backupLoc.
        Finally, the temporary report file is moved to reportLoc.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if any of the delete or move operations encounter an I/O exception.

      • getOutputLoc

        public java.lang.String getOutputLoc()
        Get the location CloseReport moves the report to.
        Returns:
        The absolute location the report will be moved to when closed.

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
